messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Question about camp for unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: not in vermont, but grace s not back to school camp in oregon, for sure.  all the unschoolers I know around here go, and it was an amazing experience for my
messages.messageBody:
not in vermont, but grace's not back to school camp in oregon, for sure. all the unschoolers I know around here go, and it was an amazing experience for my daughter last year, and she's going back this year. it's the highlight of the year for so many!
lyla




From: always.october
Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 2010 8:28 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Question about camp for unschoolers



Hi, everyone. Does anyone have any first-hand experience with the Not Back To School Camp in Vermont, run by Grace Llewellyn?

My daughter is interested in it.

Thanks!

Lucy







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
